body: @Pleb Ogata is hot and he has daddy issues
Thank you for ruining my day.
Like. Oripa is literally the ship name 尾リパ = Oripa. Whoever's been translating and/or also tagging the artist's work. It's all Ogata/Asirpa, babes.
LMAO. they translated her name wrong. This is literally Ogata/Asirpa doujin. (For the poor sap below, she's just aged up lmao.)
Not sure why Ogata is so damn popular but I've yet to see Asirpa in hentai and I thank God for it every day.
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me
Fucking Ogata, biggest asshole in all of japan
